item.name: Get all permissions for current admin user

request.description: Retrieves all permissions assigned to the current admin user

response.name: Unauthorized access or not an admin user

request.description: Retrieves the approval status for the current driver user

response.name: Unauthorized access or not a driver user

request.description: Creates a request for a driver to join a specific vendor

response.name: Unauthorized access or not a driver user
Driver profile or vendor not found

item.name: Login a user and return JWT tokens

exec: // Check if the response has the tokens and a success status
// Optional: log to console for debugging
console.log("Access token and Refresh token set successfully.");
console.warn("Access or Refresh token not found in response, or status not 'success'.");

request.description: Authenticates a user and returns JWT access and refresh tokens
Logs out the current user and invalidates their JWT tokens
Completes a user's profile with additional role-specific information based on their user type
Completes a user's profile with additional role-specific information based on their user type
Completes a user's profile with additional role-specific information based on their user type

item.name: Resend verification code to user's phone number

request.description: Generates and sends a new SMS verification code to the user's phone number

response.name: Validation error or user already verified

item.name: Refresh access token using refresh token

exec: console.warn("Token not updated: either status is not 'success' or access_token is missing.");

request.description: Generate a new access token using a valid refresh token

item.name: Register a new user with basic details

exec: // Save values from the request body
console.log("Environment variables set: user_email and user_password");

request.description: Creates a new user account with basic details and sends a verification code via SMS

exec: // Parse the request body if it's a string
console.error("Request body is not valid JSON.");
// Check and set the environment variable
console.warn("new_password not found in request body.");

request.description: Resets a user's password using a verification code

response.name: Invalid verification code or validation error

request.description: Initiates a password reset by sending a verification code to the user's phone number

response.name: Reset code sent successfully or user not found (ambiguous for security)
Email not provided or validation error

exec: // Check if the response has the tokens and a success status
// Optional: log to console for debugging
console.log("Access token and Refresh token set successfully.");
console.warn("Access or Refresh token not found in response, or status not 'success'.");

request.description: Validates the SMS verification code sent to the user's phone number

response.name: Invalid verification code or validation error

item.name: Get all journeys for a client

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the client whose journeys to retrieve

request.description: Get all journeys associated with a specific client. Access limited by user role - admin can view any client's journeys, vendors can only view journeys for related clients, and clients can only view their own journeys.

response.name: Client journeys successfully retrieved

item.name: Remove a relationship between client and vendor

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the client
(Required) The ID of the vendor to disassociate from the client

request.description: Delete an existing relationship between a client and a vendor. Only admin users or the client itself can perform this action.

item.name: Create a relationship between client and vendor

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the client
(Required) The ID of the vendor to associate with the client

request.description: Create a new relationship between a client and a vendor. Only admin users or the client itself can perform this action.

item.name: Get all vendors related to a client

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the client whose vendors to retrieve

request.description: Get all vendors associated with a specific client. Only admin users or the client itself can access this information.

response.name: Client vendors successfully retrieved

item.name: Get details for a specific client

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the client to retrieve

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific client. Access limited by user role - admin can view any client, vendors can only view related clients, and clients can only view themselves.

response.name: Client details successfully retrieved

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the client to update

request.description: Update information for a specific client. Only admin users or the client itself can perform this action.

response.name: Client successfully updated

item.name: Get all clients available to the current user

request.description: Returns all clients for admin users, or only related clients for vendor users

response.name: List of clients successfully retrieved

item.name: Submit a request to join a vendor as a driver

request.description: Submit a request to join a specific vendor as a driver. This creates a pending request that must be approved by the vendor.

response.name: Invalid request data or failed to submit
Duplicate request or already a member

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the driver to update availability for

request.description: Update the availability status of a specific driver. This endpoint allows toggling between available and unavailable states. Access may be limited based on user role and relationship to the driver.

item.name: Get all journeys associated with a driver

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the driver to retrieve journeys for

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all journeys associated with a specific driver. Results can be filtered by journey status. Access may be limited based on user role and relationship to the driver.

response.name: Driver journeys retrieved successfully

item.name: Get all payments associated with a driver

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the driver to retrieve payments for

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all payments associated with a specific driver. Results can be filtered by payment type. Access may be limited based on user role and relationship to the driver.

response.name: Driver payments retrieved successfully

item.name: Submit a resource request (fuel, dispatch fee, etc.)

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the driver submitting the request

request.description: Submit a request for resources such as fuel reimbursement, dispatch fees, or other driver-related expenses. The request will be reviewed and approved by the vendor.

response.name: Resource request submitted successfully
Invalid request data or failed to submit

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the driver to retrieve

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific driver by ID. Access may be limited based on user role and relationship to the driver.

response.name: Driver details successfully retrieved

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the driver to update

request.description: Update detailed information for a specific driver by ID. Access may be limited based on user role and relationship to the driver.

response.name: Driver details successfully updated

item.name: Get all drivers with optional filtering

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of drivers with optional filtering by status, vendor, and availability. Access restricted to admin, super_admin, and vendor roles.

response.name: Drivers list successfully retrieved

item.name: Assign a driver to a journey

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the journey to assign driver to

request.description: Assign a driver to a specific journey. Only vendors can assign drivers to journeys.

response.name: Driver assigned successfully
Invalid request data or failed to assign driver

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the journey to cancel

request.description: Cancel a specific journey with an optional reason. Different roles may have different permissions to cancel journeys.

response.name: Journey cannot be cancelled in current state

item.name: Get all payments associated with a journey

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the journey to get payments for

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all payments associated with a specific journey.

response.name: List of payments retrieved successfully

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the journey to update status for

request.description: Update the status of a specific journey. Different roles may have different permissions to update status.

response.name: Journey status updated successfully
Invalid request data or failed to update status

item.name: Get all waybills associated with a journey

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the journey to get waybills for

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all waybills associated with a specific journey.

response.name: List of waybills retrieved successfully

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the journey to retrieve

request.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific journey by ID. Access may be limited based on user role and relationship to the journey.

response.name: Journey details retrieved successfully

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the journey to update

request.description: Update detailed information for a specific journey by ID. Access may be limited based on user role and relationship to the journey.

response.name: Journey details successfully updated

item.name: Get all journeys with optional filtering

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of journeys with optional filtering by status, client, vendor, or driver.

response.name: List of journeys retrieved successfully

request.description: Create a new journey plan. Only clients and vendors can create journeys.

response.name: Journey created successfully
Invalid request data or failed to create journey

item.name: Send a notification to a user (admin only)

request.description: Send a notification to a specific user. Requires admin privileges.

response.name: Notification sent successfully

item.name: Send notifications to multiple users (admin only)

request.description: Send notifications to multiple users at once. Requires admin privileges.

item.name: Mark all notifications as read for the current user

request.description: Mark all notifications as read for the authenticated user.

response.name: All notifications marked as read successfully

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the notification to mark as read

request.description: Mark a specific notification as read. Only accessible to the notification owner.

response.name: Notification marked as read successfully

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the notification to delete

request.description: Delete a specific notification. Only accessible to the notification owner.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the notification to retrieve

request.description: Retrieve a specific notification by its ID. Only accessible to the notification owner.

response.name: Notification retrieved successfully

item.name: Get all notifications for the current user

query.description: Filter to show only unread notifications

request.description: Retrieve all notifications for the authenticated user with pagination and filtering options.

response.name: Notifications retrieved successfully

query.description: Filter to show only unread notifications
Filter to show only unread notifications

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the bank account to delete

request.description: Delete a bank account by ID. Users can only delete their own bank accounts unless they have administrative privileges.

response.name: Bank account not found or unauthorized

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the bank account to update

request.description: Update details for a specific bank account owned by the current user.

response.name: Bank account updated successfully

request.description: Retrieve all bank accounts associated with the current user.

response.name: List of bank accounts retrieved successfully

request.description: Create a new bank account for the current user.

response.name: Bank account created successfully

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the payment request to approve

request.description: Approve a pending payment request. Access limited to vendors, admins, and super admins.

response.name: Payment request approved successfully

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the payment request to reject

request.description: Reject a pending payment request with optional reason. Access limited to vendors, admins, and super admins.

request.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific payment request by ID.

request.description: Create a new payment request for petrol, maintenance, or other expenses.

response.name: Payment request created successfully

request.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific payment by ID.

response.name: Payment details retrieved successfully

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the payment to update

request.description: Update payment status or details. Access limited to admins and super admins.

response.name: Payment updated successfully

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of payments with optional filtering by status, payment type, and journey ID.

request.description: Create a new payment record. Access limited to clients, vendors, admins, and super admins.
